CmdLine: set -ex 	&& for bits in 		/usr/bin/*2to3* 		/usr/bin/*python* 		/usr/bin/pdb* 		/usr/bin/py* 	; do 		dpkg-divert --rename "$bits"; 	done
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -ex 	&& buildDeps=' 		tcl-dev 		tk-dev 	' 	&& runDeps=' 		tcl 		tk 	' 	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $runDeps $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* 	&& curl -fSL "https://www.python.org/ftp/python/${PYTHON_VERSION%%[a-z]*}/Python-$PYTHON_VERSION.tar.xz" -o python.tar.xz 	&& curl -fSL "https://www.python.org/ftp/python/${PYTHON_VERSION%%[a-z]*}/Python-$PYTHON_VERSION.tar.xz.asc" -o python.tar.xz.asc 	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" 	&& gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$GPG_KEY" 	&& gpg --batch --verify python.tar.xz.asc python.tar.xz 	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" python.tar.xz.asc 	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/python 	&& tar -xJC /usr/src/python --strip-components=1 -f python.tar.xz 	&& rm python.tar.xz 		&& cd /usr/src/python 	&& ./configure 		--enable-loadable-sqlite-extensions 		--enable-shared 	&& make -j$(nproc) 	&& make install 	&& ldconfig 	&& pip3 install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip==$PYTHON_PIP_VERSION 	&& [ "$(pip list | awk -F '[ ()]+' '$1 == "pip" { print $2; exit }')" = "$PYTHON_PIP_VERSION" ] 	&& find /usr/local -depth 		\( 		    \( -type d -a -name test -o -name tests \) 		    -o 		    \( -type f -a -name '*.pyc' -o -name '*.pyo' \) 		\) -exec rm -rf '{}' + 	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove $buildDeps 	&& rm -rf /usr/src/python ~/.cache
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /usr/local/bin 	&& ln -s easy_install-3.5 easy_install 	&& ln -s idle3 idle 	&& ln -s pydoc3 pydoc 	&& ln -s python3 python 	&& ln -s python3-config python-config
Commands.Name: run
